entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023
